Wava Chan is an Engineering Major from Brookfield, Connecticut. She is currently studying at [Harvey Mudd College](https://hmc.edu), in Claremont, California. In the past, she has worked on a variety of embedded systems projects, from autonomous underwater vehicles to self-driving construction equipment. 

In her free time, she likes to paint, cook (and eat) good food, and frolick in Linde Field with her many friends.
